data.title: Tomorrow Now About Tomorrow Now
data.meta_description: Tomorrow Now supports mid-sized companies throughout their innovation journey. Businesses can benefit from our experience
data.text:
Thierry Janssen, entrepreneur and consultant, uses an approach based on his broad experience in implementing technological solutions, whether in terms of what they can offer to customers or how they operate, as well as his background in driving teams in their business endeavours.

Innovation is very often at the core of new business initiatives proposed by start-ups; Thierry Janssen offers his support to ‘Réseau Entreprendre’ by sharing best practices he has learnt through his broad experience in order to accelerate their time to market.

Thierry Janssen, entrepreneur and consultant, uses an approach based on his broad experience in implementing technological solutions, whether in terms of what they can offer to customers or how they operate, as well as his background in driving teams in their business endeavours.
